welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Glenn Dale, known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that this lovely city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport is the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is home to many airlines, including Southwest and American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used by Delta and Spirit Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C serves as a hub for United Airlines and other major carriers.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D is home to regional carriers and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves primarily regional and commuter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Terminal B/C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves mainly domestic flights and some international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network for up to 45 minutes per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
